extendedInfo.description: Building Start is a field services platform used in construction and engineering to perform centralized test plan authoring and management and push the test plan from the cloud to field devices to perform on-site field testing digitally. Applications include Airnab and BuildingTest. This can be used for paperless air and water balancing and paperless commissioning.Once a field technician has been assigned a project, they can receive the project on their field device and perform the test plan and responses offline and synchronize them back into the cloud when they complete their work for the day. Building Start is widely used in the construction industry with over 30,000 construction projects digitally captured in such efforts as Test, Adjust & Balance (TAB), Building Startup, Building Commissioning (LEED, Green Building,etc) and Energy Audits.

reviews.title: Decent
reviews.comment: But compared to the iPad version, it feels lacking. I specifically use android only devices and the iPad app looks and works better, in my opinion. I\'ll give five stars when I see an updated ui and more options/functions.
reviews.author: Jonathan Stogner

reviews.title: Test & Balance
reviews.comment: I use this app on on a Motorola Bionic. It is very convenient for entering information in the field.
reviews.author: Dave Reichel

reviews.title: Add photo to deficiency
reviews.comment: Make it so that a photo can be added from gallery that you already snapped.
reviews.author: kevin parrish

reviews.title: General
reviews.comment: 1.Recommend a \"synchronization complete or failure\" notification be installed. 2. For values that are known to be numerical the keyboard should default to the number pad(?). e.g. outlet readings, static pressure readings, volt and amp readings.
reviews.author: Walter Judd

reviews.title: Finally!!
reviews.comment: Looks great so far! True test this coming this work week!! Thank you!
reviews.author: A Google User
